first.name: Barry
options: I'm very disappointed in you, Barry.
How could you do this, Barry?
Barry, you need to fix this.
I don't understand, Barry...

repeat.name: Barry
options: I'm very disappointed in you, Barry.
How could you do this, Barry?
Barry, you need to fix this.
I don't understand, Barry...

1_a.name: Barry
1_a.text: [color=lime]I don't know how this could have happened, Sir.[/color]
options: That's a bit difficult to believe, Barry.
Well, we need to find a way to fix it now.
I imagine it had something to do with you fiddling with computer settings you had no business interfering with.

1_a_2.name: Barry
1_a_2.content: [color=lime]Yes sir. I'm working on it right now, Sir.[/color]

2_a.name: Barry
2_a.content: [color=lime]I didn't mean to do it, Sir.[/color]

2_a_1.name: Lieutenant
2_a_1.content: You didn't mean to make the computer virtually impossible to use, thus jeopardising the crew, the ship and the mission?

2_a_1_a.name: Barry
options: Well, that's great. As long as you're sorry.
I'm pleased to hear it. I was about to put you on report, but since you seem so sincerely sorry, I'll let you off.

2_a_1_a_1_a.name: Barry
2_a_1_a_1_a.content: [color=lime]. . . I'll still need to fix this though, won't I?[/color]

2_a_1_a_1_a_1.name: Lieutenant
2_a_1_a_1_a_1.content: Yes, Barry. You need to fix the computer so we don't all die from your idiocy. That would be very good of you.

3_a.name: Barry
3_a.text: [color=lime]I know Sir, I'm working on it.[/color]
options: Let me know how you get on.
What are you doing to fix it?
Do you know what's going to happen if you don't sort this out?

3_a_2.name: Barry
options: What's that?
Wait, I have an idea.
Whatever it is Barry, you had better have a good plan.

3_a_2_a.name: Barry
3_a_2_a.content: [color=lime]I'm going to try pressing a button. . .[/color]

3_a_2_b.name: Barry
options: What kind of training did you get when you were qualifying to be a Pilot?
Try pushing random buttons.
I think you should not touch anything and let me and John try to fix this.

3_a_2_b_1.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_1.content: [color=lime]Aerodynamics, calculus, spatial geometry, mechanical engineering, first aid, how to drink 7 shots of rum and vomit out your nose, navigation. . .[/color]

3_a_2_b_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_2_b_1_a.content: Navigation! |Wait, seven shots and what? No, nevermind actually.

3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a.content: You must have learned about observing your surroundings, noticing minor details and changes of scenery?

3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
content: If you replay the scene in your head, can you visualise the console again? All the keys and screens you saw to change the language the first time?

3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1.content: [color=lime]. . .|@Actually Sir, I think I just about can.[/color]

3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.content: [color=lime]Yes... yes..... yes! YES! I've got it![/color]

3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.content: [color=lime]Uh, not completely Sir. But it looks like it's a little bit better. I'll keep trying.[/color]@[Barry has fixed the computer interface by 10%]

3_a_2_b_2.name: Barry
options: Yes.
No.

3_a_2_b_2_a.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_2_a.content:
[color=lime]Okay, Sir. Here goes. . .||

Well, so much for that.[/color]

3_a_2_b_2_b.name: Barry
3_a_2_b_2_b.content: [color=lime]Okay, let me know when you want me to do something Sir.[/color]

3_a_2_c_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_2_c_a_1_a.content: You were going to start pushing random buttons, weren't you Barry?

3_a_3.name: Barry
options: Can you imagine not being able to order those spicy kebabs from the food dispenser?
Can you imagine not being able to activate the turbolift to get back to your quarters?
Can you imagine the crew collectively stuffing you into the airlock?
Can you imagine what the rest of the crew is going to do to us if they find out?

3_a_3_b_1.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_b_1.content: And getting angrier by the minute.

3_a_3_c.name: Barry
3_a_3_c.content: [color=lime]But they won't be able to open the outer doors without a voice confirmation.[/color]

3_a_3_c_1.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_c_1.content: I'm sure they'd figure something out.

3_a_3_d.name: Barry
3_a_3_d.content: [color=lime]I don't want to think about it.[/color]

3_a_3_d_1.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_d_1.content: Soon you won't have a choice.

4_a.name: Barry
options: How could you change the language settings like that? Doesn't it need an admin password?
Why did you think you could learn a new language so quickly?
Why didn't you tell us as soon as it happened?

4_a_1.name: Barry
options: Do you have some higher authorisation that I don't know about?
How did you know what the captain's password was?

4_a_1_a.name: Barry
options: "password"?
"qwerty"?
"ford"?

4_a_1_b.name: Barry
4_a_1_b.content: [color=lime]Someone left a sticky note with the password on my console from the last shift.[/color]

4_a_1_b_1.name: Lieutenant
4_a_1_b_1.content: I guess that means another Watch is first up for cleaning the heads next Saturday, at least.

4_a_2.name: Barry
4_a_2.text: [color=lime]I heard that when you go to a new country you learn the language really quickly.[/color]
options: How quickly?
Changing the computer interface isn't like going to a new country.

4_a_2_a.name: Barry
4_a_2_a.content: [color=lime]Uh, I don't know. I guess . . . |a few months, instead of a few years?[/color]

4_a_2_b.name: Barry
4_a_2_b.content: [color=lime]Yes, Sir. I realised that after about three seconds.[/color]

4_a_3.name: Barry
4_a_3.content: [color=lime]I was a bit embarrassed and hoped maybe it wouldn't be that noticeable.[/color]

4_a_3_a.name: Lieutenant
4_a_3_a.content: You thought that we wouldn't notice that the computer was IN ANOTHER LANGUAGE?

4_a_3_a_1.name: Barry
4_a_3_a_1.content: [color=lime]It kind of looks a bit like English. . .[/color]

4_a_3_a_1_a_1_a_1.name: Barry
4_a_3_a_1_a_1_a_1.content: [color=lime]A couple of the letters look the same. . .[/color]
